thread.title: BRIEF-Noble Midstream Partners Increases Quarterly Distribution

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Noble Midstream Partners Increases Quarterly Distribution

organizations.name: brief-noble midstream partners increases quarterly distribution noble midstream partners lp

text:
Noble Midstream Partners LP:
* NOBLE MIDSTREAM PARTNERS INCREASES QUARTERLY DISTRIBUTION
* NOBLE MIDSTREAM PARTNERS LP - BOARD OF CO’S GENERAL PARTNER DECLARED CASH DISTRIBUTION OF $0.5110/UNIT FOR Q1 2018, A 24% INCREASE VERSUS PRIOR YEAR QUARTER
* NOBLE MIDSTREAM PARTNERS - BOARD OF CO’S GENERAL PARTNER DECLARED CASH DISTRIBUTION OF $0.5110/UNIT FOR Q1 2018, A 4.7% INCREASE FROM SEQUENTIAL QUARTER Source text for Eikon:
